reviewtext: boy did it ever!  The cable company came and installed our cable modem and used a cheap splitter. I upgraded to this and the difference was amazing. Our cable internet seems to run better and the TVs seem to have better picture. Maybe its just an illusion, but after using my parents internet modem with a cheap splitter, maybe not.  Well worth the extra money.
summary: Doesn't seem like it would make a difference but...
